website_summaries.verdict: A versatile lamp that provides plenty of light.
pros: Whether you need to add light to a room or you need a good reading light, this lamp will do the job
Its three touch-activated brightness settings make it apt for a variety of tasks, and the gooseneck is easy to adjust
This lamp has a sleek style and comes in two colors
cons: This lamp and its clip are on the larger side, and the clip is a bit flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Reading Light for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for kids because it's bright and doesn't get hot. It simply plugs into a standard outlet using the included cord and it can either clamp to an object or it can be permanently attached using a screw. My daughter uses this light to read in bed and she loves it. The simple touch style on/off works great. The first press is dim light, the second is medium, the third is the brightest (very bright) and a fourth touch turns it off. We could not be happier with this light.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap fix for vanity lighting
customer_reviews.text: I am a satisfied customer. I bought this to use with my vanity because my room is too dim for makeup application. It has 3 settings and at the highest setting, it gives a gorgeous white light perfect for my needs. I clip it onto my vanity mirror. Its not the prettiest fix to my issue, but better my vanity looking ugly than me! :D (Pics included, excuse the messy vanity)
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: I love this little light that packs a big punch
customer_reviews.text: I love this little light that packs a big punch...first of all let me say I purchased this light based on its customer reviews.... thank you all ...the light does the trick fits in small places ... sturdy clip and the crème de la crème of it all is ...the light has a dimmer with three different settings..low, medium and high ...it's a keeper...currently I am using it to light my catus desert plants .. hoped the attachment came out
customer_reviews.author: donnamarie

customer_reviews.title: FIRE hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lamp. We had this lamp for two months and one day it started to melt and almost caught on fire. Luckily we caught before our house burned down. LEDs are not supposed to get hot.
customer_reviews.author: armyminusr

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I got along without it!
customer_reviews.text: I work in beauty so I must be in full makeup everyday. There's nothing like the natural light of day to apply makeup but not always possible as some days I start very early and it can still be dark outside. Can't say enough great things about this little lamp. It's perfect for my needs. Bright enough so I can see great detail in my makeup application. The goose neck is a plus so I can adjust to exactly where I need it. Love that it's portable and can be moved for reading purposes. This little jewel will be traveling with me wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Barragan

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard! Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I am praising God today for protecting my child last night as she slept. The lamp never stayed where I put it very well, so I should have known better, but the touch to turn on feature made it even more dangerous because after it fell into her bedding she bumped it and turned it on. Her blanket is melted to it, her sheets have a brown burn mark on them. So many people are using this in or around beds- if you are getting this is a desk lamp- go for it, but if you were using it as I did, near a bed, get something that is more stable and can’t be turned on by bumping it.
customer_reviews.author: Mommahaas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Desk Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This KEDSUM 7W Dimmable LED Desk Lamp is a fantastic desk lamp! I especially like the 3 different intensities of light one can choose and how easy and convenient it is to select the settings, as well as how easy it is to turn on and off the lamp with just a gentle tap. This was a replacement for a cheaper lamp that I had that ended up not lasting very long. This lamp appears much more durable and is certainly more esthetically pleasing. It arrived quickly and was packaged very well, ensuring it arrived in perfect condition. This lamp has most definitely earned the five-star rating I have given it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nemitz

customer_reviews.title: Mounts vertically and horizontally with a perfect lamp position.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an LED lamp for reading while in bed. It was not very adjustable and the light was a bit harsh. I found this one and knew it would be a perfect fit- and I was right! Cool, easy on the eyes, very adjustable, well made, and fits my needs so much better than the big-box store product. Easy to to use, has 3 stages of lighting and stays in place rather than flopping down once set. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bart S.

customer_reviews.title: AC Connection Problems
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this lamp I was very very pleased with the design and versatility. It worked great for about 3 months and then started have problems with the ac connection. I had to wrap the cord around the clip and tape it to keep a connection. I tried replacing the ac adapter and that was not the problem. It must be the cheap electrical connection. I think the light is great but the connection is crap. Do not buy this product unless you are prepared to buy several. I rely on my overhead light for my needle felting business and I am going to buy something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Teemartoonies

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of the box, clampt it to bed frame, turned it on by touching the clamp 3 times (low, medium, high) and said WOW! I read before bedtime and I like to see colors in magazines and in the bedroom in their true daylight (sunshine) colors. This lamp has a Kelvin temperature of around 6000 degrees, pretty close to same as the sun. I don’t like what’s called warm, around 2700 K. This lamp is beautiful, flexible and I couldn’t be happier. And as you can see, I like reflected ambiance. This lamp is bright enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: Yurij

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: The Kedsum Dimmable Eye-Care Lamp gives off a pleasant light that doesn't strain ones eyes even at the brightest setting. And the bendible​ neck that holds the light is equally as strainless to bend. What's more, the clip that clips this clip-on lamp to whatever you clip it onto is also strainlessly openable and closable and holds like a whatever gripping onto a whatever, with the lighting button on it responsive to the slightest touch of the digit of ones choice. This Kedsum clip-on lamp is what I've been looking for for a long time but was in the dark where to find it until I seen it in the Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud Tumbler

customer_reviews.title: Convenient lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this as a bed lamp for the last year. I didn't realize this when I bought this but this lamp doesn't have a button, instead you just tap the base/clip part and it has 3 adjustable brightness settings. I love this, as when you're tired or sleepy, you can just halfheartedly slap the thing off, and it's great. The brightest setting is very bright and I haven't had to replace the bulb yet. The adjustable neck is very stable and holds its position well.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Great Light, with customer service that stands behind its product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light for my dad to use while reading in bed. It clips onto his wooden headboard easily, and it adjusts to his height as needed. He loves that it has a bright setting, since he has cataracts. The customer service was really helpful, too, when the bright setting stopped working. We contacted KEDSUM through Amazon and they replied within hours, stating that they would either replace the item or give us a refund. We were so happy with the light that we had it replaced. The new unit works perfectly, and now my mother wants one too! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sgrooms86

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Very cool lamp! It's larger than I expected, but it works brilliantly and does the job well. The clamp is very secure and grips tight. The lights themselves are bright and powerful, and have 3 brightness settings. Most days I use the lowest setting for makeup, as the bulbs can almost be TOO bright. If I could change one thing, it would be to not have such intense bulbs, and to make the color of the light less stark white. It would look great with ever-so-slightly-warmer lights, as these LEDs tend to wash my face out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, space-saving, and bright!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little lamp; I use it while working at my draft table. It's a nice bright-white light so I can see the true color of the paints I'm working with. The flexible gooseneck is sturdy and contorts to any angle, which is great to remove glare on the canvas I'm working on. Three light settings are good- I use the brightest to work with and the lowest to just light up that area of the room. Used almost daily for four months and still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marlay

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Bulky and Hot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk or reading light. It has 3 settings, and the third is quite bright. The clamp that holds the lamp onto a surface is rather bulky and can't fit in between things. The light also gets very hot. It makes me wonder how efficient the light really is? It's summer and this light makes my room all the more uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic portable lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Best lamps ever. We have 2 that we have had for nearly 4 years and we fight over them because they are so handy. As a matter of fact I am having an electrical issue with the switch in my bathroom so we plugged one into an extension cord and now we have a bathroom light for the time being. I even take them to shows for extra lighting and they aren’t ugly and overbearing either. I am definitely going to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Niki Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grippers fall off!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a great light and one that I would have given a 5-star review if not for one major issue: the rubber grippers that hold the light in place fall off constantly! They were not glued in place and I'm guessing they should have been. Annoying because due to them falling off all the time, two of the grippers are now lost and the light will no longer stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and very helpful for those who have difficulty seeing in low light.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one when my husband and I were constantly arguing about light. I have a congenital eye condition that has caused me to have a difficult time seeing in low light. He is extremely light sensitive. This light allows me to put a light on my individual area without driving my husband crazy.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Well done KEDSUM
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is wonderful for the price. Its clip is very sturdy. The neck can be posed in countless ways, making it extremely versatile, and the light offers three graduations of illumination well suited for different strengths of natural light. My purpose for buying this particular lamp was to clip it onto an art table to rid myself of unwanted shadows. I did not expect to be able to shift the lamp to different, less sturdy locations, however, that clip holds the lamp very securely no matter what I clip it to. Now, the power cord is a but short, but that's why we have extension cords. Well done, KEDSUM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed reading light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's bed light. It seems great so far. We have only had it a few days, so I can't comment on its longevity. I like the size of the light source. It is bigger than most night reading lights, so it provides a great amount of light. It also has 3 intensities of light, so she can choose the amount of light she wants. And, the clip is large enough to clip to her headboard easily. And, the stem of the light is long enough and flexible enough to position easily and so far it keeps its position well. And, the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Desperate Housewife

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.  Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for. The clamp is very handy and well constructed, but the screw attachment adds to the mounting versatility and stability. The neck is very flexible and allows for easy positioning. All three levels of light/brightness are distinct and so easy on the eyes yet fully functional. The touch switch is wonderful. It is easily accessible and reliable upon every use. I keep this unit mounted to the windowsill by my armchair. It is attractive enough to keep exposed, but slim enough to tuck behind the curtain when I choose to have it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works if you have a thinner shelf
customer_reviews.text: We needed a simple clip light for our kid's bedside shelf (IKEA Kallax) and thought this would work. However, the shelf was too thick for the light to clip on properly and not stick out too far. As far as a light goes, it was fine--3 brightness levels was sufficient for bedtime story readings. But the design of the clip plus thickness of the shelf did not work for us. We ended up using the light in my other kid's room to clip onto a thinner headboard shelf. Also note that it is not stable at all as a standing light, even though it is advertised to work that way as well.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: I still give it 3 stars because it looked like a decent quality light and customer service was great
customer_reviews.text: OUr light did not work upon arrival. I still give it 3 stars because it looked like a decent quality light and customer service was great. They were willing to replace it immediately, but upon receiving it we realized it wasn’t quite what we needed, so would have returned it regardless. I would recommend this lamp. I’m sure we just got a random one that didn’t work. When you sell thousands there is bound to be one or two duds.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nybakken

customer_reviews.title: Great until it just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lamp. The light was nice and bright, flexible goose neck worked perfectly for needlework, and it was portable. Then it just stopped working. Very sad when that happened. Luckily the return window was still open on Amazon. Looking for a more reliable lamp now. Thinking about a name brand like OTT LIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: Sarabeesmama

customer_reviews.title: Kedsum clip dimmable lamp with 3 settings
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Kedsum Dimmable LED lamp because I needed a small lamp that wasn't too bright next to my favorite chair. It arrived on the promised date and looked exactly as pictured on Amazon. It had 3 light settings- dim, brighter and brightest plus off. The light was steady and did not flicker. The LED light did not heat up even after 2 hours. I just got the item today so I don't know how long it will last. It firmly clamps on my side table. The gooseneck is adjustable and the light itself can be twisted towards or away from the user. I recommend this Kedsum light and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: PickyjadeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: It is to dim for what I purchased it for. I needed it to go behind my drafting table to shine through the back of my diamond painting. The glass on my table is a darker blue. I need something brighter. Otherwise, I figure I can use it else where. I would recommend this light for other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Vaughn Court

customer_reviews.title: Good lighting, badly placed on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and lightweight so they don't pull down on the shelf I needed to clip them too. They also have great task lighting. 2 design fails...need longer cords, I hate extention cords! AND..the BIG miss,the touch turn on/up button is on the clip base, should be on the light casing since the whole reason we need to clip them, is because we need light further from where they are clipped. So now...I have to really go out of my way to turn them on and up.
customer_reviews.author: techmomga

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE:. Great customer service: good desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Superb customer service. They responded immediately with a replacement lamp which is working perfectly. A perfect desk lamp especially for a small area and the clamp holds securely -- a bonus for me since I knocked the lamp thus replaces off numerous times. I like the three levels of light which works well for close work. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: The Oldbat

customer_reviews.title: a great product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: hello, this kedsum lamp is one of the only ones that has a large enough pinch opening clamp for thicker headboards. we have a wooden headboard wrapped in rattan and creates a big fat surface for clamp on lights. the last one snapped after months of use. this new one not only has a push button on/off, but it has levels of brightness. it does clamp onto this large headboard and is handy because of the switch. a great product and delivery
customer_reviews.author: jnaki

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have needed a bedside lamp for a while but have put it off mostly because I'm cheap. My laziness (getting out of the bed to turn off the overhead light) finally outweighed my cheapness. I really like this lamp. Easy to assemble, easy to attach to my headboard, easy to turn on and off. I don't have to worry about purchasing bulbs for it. I don't have to get out of bed when I'm done with my nightly reading. Win all around.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This clamp lamp is perfect for my grandma’s side rail to her bed. Her arthritis makes it difficult to use her finders like she would want so the touch feature is PERFECT for her! She loves the different brightnesses and the clamp part is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This was a wonderful surprise. Everything about it is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful surprise. Everything about it is excellent. It arrived on the expected day and the packaging was great. I love the dimmer switch, works perfectly on my bed. It can be positioned on the frame (mine is metal) and adjusted to be reached easily without getting up. The more I use the dimming feature, the move I love this product. It looks beautiful, and the clamp is very strong and sturdy. I would highly recommend this product, and will be ordering another one to put by my reading chair - the light is perfect for reading and can be dimmed as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Fate Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp - level 1 to level 3 are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp - bright enough to light up a (small) room at night but also a nice faint light if on level 1. The cable is long enough, lamp is easy to adjust/tilt. First I was concerned about not having an extra "off" button but clicking from 1-3 to "off" is so fast that I don't miss the extra "off" button. I can highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: There is “nothing” to dislike about this light! I’m totally impressed that I can use it two ways; attached or sitting on my dinning table where I use my Cricut. And the reason for needing a good light to do my work. I’m impressed and the fact I can use it in different locations and applications in my home makes this one smart purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this light. We bought one for our daughter's room a month ago and liked enough that we bought another for our son's room. It clips easily and security to the headboard of their beds to allow for a bit of nighttime reading. The flexible arm allows you to direct the light away from sensitive eyes and the three intensity settings are sufficient for most reasonable uses and sensitivities to light. The light also seems well built. Assuming it lasts, we will be very happy with this purchase and will likely buy more for the other bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for "my" side of the bed. I wanted a light to read by and I wanted to be able to reach it without getting out of bed. The 3 light levels are a bonus. Works great, solved my problem and the light is bright enough to read by--even better than the standing lamp I had near my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great above bed reading lamp. Purchased this for my voracious reader daughter who stays up all night reading. She loves the brightness and adjust-ability of this light. Three different levels of brightness. It was easy to hang above her headboard. It arrived on time and was packaged well. You can't beat this light for the price. The only negative thing about this lamp was that the hanger doesn't keep light from moving on wall. So we just put another nail on one side of lamp and this keeps it from slipping. Will probably purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Mouser

customer_reviews.title: A great buy - works very well - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent reading light for your desk or bed. We have this in our 6 year old's room and it work wells by being attached to the side of his headboard. It's EXTREMELY EASY to turn on/off - simply by touching the base with your finger (you can change the brightness by multiple levels and turn off/on). It's also quite bright - so that when he is reading at night he only needs to have this light on and then when he is done he can touch this off and go to sleep. It's also flexible in terms of how easy it is to move the neck/lamp around. I highly recommend this little light.
customer_reviews.author: That Helpful Dad

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college dorm and I’m so satisfied with this product. It’s easy to install and remove. I can install it anywhere in my room whenever I want to switch places to study or read book. There are three options of brightness and I mostly use the brightest one. The light is white and it doesn’t have much heat released when I use it for hours. The neck of the lamp I can adjust it any direction I want without it getting loose. This is great choice if you don’t have enough space for study desk and when you don’t want it to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Trang Huynh

customer_reviews.title: ddisappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second lamp after finding the first to be exactly what I wanted. I love the fact that there are three levels of brightness. However, after using the second one for fewer than a dozen times, it no longer works. I am unable to even turn it on.. It has been a huge disappointment. The first one is still working fine..
customer_reviews.author: arta beverly

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Lamp Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This little light is functional, powerful and very light. It has three choices of brightness. Even burning it for hours, it's also cool to the touch. This is my second one. My first one lasted three years. FYI, when the bulb burns out, you cannot replace it. It's a very special circuitry that doesn't allow it. However, at this price, three years of constant use is excellent. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen Allen

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, the brightest setting is very bright
customer_reviews.text: Just received the light on 1/7/17. It looks good, the brightest setting is very bright, and the clip opens wide enough to clip to my headboard. I've got no complaints as the light does exactly what I was expecting. An idea for an improvement: change the dimming switch to an actual switch/dial. The touch mechanism is finicky and requires multiple swipes to change the brightness level.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. I like the color
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. I like the color, the touch control and the versatility. I bought 2 one for myself and one for my 14 yr old daughter to replace our old incandescent lamps and couldn't be happier and my daughter loves it. Very comfortable light great for reading. This will not light up large a room but its easy to read by which is what I was looking for. I was unable to clamp it to my desk due to the build of the desk so I was going to hand it on the wall but find it stands just fine on its own,
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for only 3 months, I use it occasionally for when I paint and it has already died. It shut off when I was using it and no longer comes back on. It was a very nice light while it lasted but for the price, I expected it to last longer than 3 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Versatile craft, reading or grooming light
customer_reviews.text: This light is touch sensitive with three brightness settings. We use it at our diaper changing table (touch is nice so you can just bump it with the back of a hand). The clamp is secure and can accommodate a 2 inch object inside the jaws. The clamp has 3 rubber feet (we've had one fall off while moving the lamp but were easily push it back into the slot). The light quality is is on the cool side (bluish) so it is not best for grooming but does work well for diaper changing station. We love that the LED is always cool so we know there will never be a burn.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirlJen

customer_reviews.title: Quilting light sewing light hand sewing light EXCELLENT LIGHT SOURCE. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light source for sewing, quilting, needle work, appliqués and reading. I clip two Kedsum LED lights on either side of sewing quilting machine and over my rotary cutting table.
customer_reviews.author: Custer

customer_reviews.title: bought this for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a light at his computer desk so he could see the keyboard, but there wasn't a good place to put one. This clip-on light has proven to be the answer. He is very happy with it and uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light But That’s About It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a craft light to either use on my bedside table or clipped to my headboard. It is not very good as a clip style lamp as the plastic pads fall out constantly. It is also not good as bedside lamp because there is nothing on the bottom of the lamp. It barely stands on its own. Not worth half of what i paid for this. I have had it a week and am already looking for a replacement. The light is nice and bright so I am giving it 2 stars instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: Plahitko

customer_reviews.title: This product stopped working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a month and it stopped working. My average usage was about 15 minutes daily. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: He-lp

customer_reviews.title: Love this little light
customer_reviews.text: We live in an old farmhouse and our stove does not have a vent hood....just a fan in the wall. That corner of the kitchen tends to be dark especially in winter. It's hard to see what I'm cooking! I clipped this light to the shelf above my stove and it's been amazing. Love the 3 light levels.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: it is good for kids to study
customer_reviews.text: It is small but beautiful, convienient to clip any edge of table, has 3 level of brightness to choose from. The middle one is bright enough for kids to do homework. My daught love this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great light for reading
customer_reviews.text: This light works very well. I love the adjustable brightness levels. Easy to use, just a touch turns it on and off. The neck is strong enough to hold the head in any position. The clamp, however, is not "grippy" enough to clamp sideways without sliding. At least not on the size board I tried. It has a smooth foam pad inside the clamp. A rubber with gripping lines would probably help it hold better. All in all, it's a great reading light for my child's room.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This lamp would be fine if you have a thick surface
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a reading lamp for my son. The problem is that the lamp is so top-heavy that it won't stay upright. This lamp would be fine if you have a thick surface, and have about 3 inches in length in which to attach. It definitely will not attach to a headboard. I also tried setting it on his night stand. There are two problems with this. (1) The lamp is not stable and (2) it does not provide enough light at that distance. I would not recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Krizek

customer_reviews.title: Nice Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: WOW, very impressed with this light. I plugged it in then looked for a switch to turn it on....duh, it's touch sensitive....AWESOME, and it has 3 levels. The clip is sturdy and fits perfectly on the corner of my desk. If I had to pick a con, it would be the flexible gooseneck. It's about 13" and I wish it was just about 2-3 inches more for better flexibility. But even the way it is, I'd buy another one! Edit: I still love the lamp but I found one more con...about 3.5 inches from the base of the gooseneck is not flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Light!
customer_reviews.text: It provides great lighting for my craft station! It clips perfectly on my IKEA Skadis pegboard. The neck of the light is nice and bendy and once you have it where you want it, it stays put. I will more than likely purchase a few more to go in my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: For my office desk
customer_reviews.text: I just realized it is missing one of the black rubber things that keeps it in place - I could not figure out why it would not stay clips so I am hanging it on the sign of my credenza - do they sell the part?
customer_reviews.author: love to cook!!

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: This light is great for my kids to read in bed. Nice brightness - just wish the dimming went in the opposite direction (first time you hit the button it is dim, second medium, third time bright) but if you are reading on dim and then want to go to sleep you have to cycle through 2 brighter settings first... But the light quality is excellent and the clip holds well
customer_reviews.author: Dadof3

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase, low profile
customer_reviews.text: Slim profile lamp with nice large clip but unfortunately the table I purchased is too thick for this to clamp onto. Still love the lamp and touch control for 3 different settings of light. Doesn't make a big statement, which is exactly what I wanted. Flexibility to position the light is convenient. Happy with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dona

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: First off, the light arrived well in advance of the projected date, so I liked that. For me, the light has worked fine - I needed something like this for my computer desk and it is just the right size and very movable. I'm using the clip as the base since the table edge is just a little thick for the clip, but it is stable and blends in with the other items on my desk. I really like the light itself - the non-glaring glow is pleasing and the controls are nice, touch-sensitive. For me, it is just fine and I would recommend to others who need a small but very practical and useful desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: It turned on the first time I tried it, but then it never worked again. I don't give a lot of one-star reviews, but I also hate the power button and am guessing its design has a lot to do with this defect.
customer_reviews.author: sara s

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My past lamp wasn't bright. This one is great. I love to clamp the lamp to a wall shelf & not sit on my desk taking up room. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This light attaches to the head board and makes a good night light when it's faced to the wall on ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a light for my grandkids bedroom. This light attaches to the head board and makes a good night light when it's faced to the wall on dim. My grandkids enjoy the fact that you just touch it and it lights up. This lamp is a lot safer then the "light bulb" lamp I had by the bedside. I always worried that the boys playing would shatter the bulb causing broken glass everywhere. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The light levels are perfect for night time reading in bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my oldest grandson (10 years old) last Christmas. The light levels are perfect for night time reading in bed, and it clips tight to the edge of his upper bunk. Just order a second KEDSUM for his younger brother who decided to move into the lower bunk. They are prefect for keeping the peace with 2 different timetables - the younger brother reads later! I highly recommend this light.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Easy to use. It clips on to my bookcase next to my bed, and is perfect for reading at night. My mother got one as well. She had problems getting the clamp to open because her hands are weak, so I suggested that she use the palms of her hands together, and she was able to get it to clip onto her headboard. She loves her lamp as well. Note, if you are ordering the "black" one, it is only the cord that is black. The lamp is white.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L

customer_reviews.title: I guess I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great light but mine started going off and on by itself. So I can't use it anymore. I would like to exchange it for another if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS!  DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This light stays on for a few minutes, then shuts off by itself. I get up, turn it back on, and in 10-15 minutes, it is off again! Don't know if it is defective or just a poor quality lamp. I wish I hadn't purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Lanelle

customer_reviews.title: Clipping this lamp on the side is perfect way to get a much needed light source here
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp because my computer desk is very small & I do not have room on the desk for a lamp. Clipping this lamp on the side is perfect way to get a much needed light source here. I am very pleased with it as it has worked seemlessly since I've had it. I only adjusted the goose neck the first time I set it up and it's been a big help. I also wanted a lamp that plugs in and not work off batteries as I don't want to have to worry about batteries. I do like this lamp very much and I would recommend it to anyone in need of a lamp for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headboard reading lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with this lamp. It has a large clamp that attaches securely to my headboard. I LOVE the switch - it is on the clip, rather than the cord, which is very convenient. It has 3 settings, and extremely easy to use. Perfect for a reading lamp at the 2 higher settings, and just right for a night light at the low setting. Price is very reasonable too. Perfect choice for me. I just received it this week, so can't address how long it will last, but very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: No where mam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and has three settings.
customer_reviews.text: Great night light, and plant light. I use mine for both. It's been over a year now and still working. I use as a night light and also for my plants, it run on all night and still like brand new. Very pleased and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this lamp. Have it clamped to the bed's headboard and it fits perfectly. Great light for reading, which is what I bought it for. Also like the fact it has 2 degrees of brightness. Yes, I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M.

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping experience
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lamp!!!! Looks great and was exactly what I was looking for, which was a bright enough clip-on reading light for my bedroom! I LOVE the dimmer aspect of it and the simple on/off/dimmer feature, along with the easy clip-on, and easily bendable neck! Now I need to buy more of these!! Highly recommend this seller and this product! And, this is something I didn't know about, I placed the order on Friday, and the lamp was delivered on SUNDAY!!! Who could ask for more than that??? Oh, and the price is perfect too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp that will serve you well!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase! It's been a year or two since I've had this lamp and I have had no trouble with it at all. Three settings of brightness, a sturdy clamp and a pivoting head make for a versatile night lamp that I am very happy I found! The price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Nina T.

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned, replaced, and works great....wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: So I see a lot of 1 star reviews stating the light didn't work upon arrival, or died shortly thereafter. The light I received malfunctioned right out of the box. This was annoying, for sure, but I emailed KEDSUM and explained the situation. They sent me a replacement light that works properly. So, after the initial hiccup, I have the lamp it it works as advertised. I'm willing to give it 4 stars because the lamp is nice....strong clamp, simple operation, very bright at highest setting....and the customer service was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lamp for Needleworkers
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is fantastic! I am a needleworker and I desperately needed a good lamp to work by. I researched as many as 50 lamps and always came back to this one. It did not disappoint. Anyone who needs a lamp for reading...this is the one for you. There is no glare and it doesn't disturb people around you who may be watching tv or trying to sleep. It's not heavy or bulky and the gooseneck is awesome so you can direct the light perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Fixx

customer_reviews.title: Love this new lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this new lamp!!! So exciting to have a light that I can attach to my counters edge to see detailed work more closely. It does not appear to get too warm and I love that it has a dimmer adjustable option. Wonderful. I bought it in white and it is heavy duty and attractive. We may get another one to attach to our headboard at night!
customer_reviews.author: Cece Oström

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect to tables very easily or to the frame holding my stitchery
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't connect to tables very easily or to the frame holding my stitchery. It's a great light, it's just not stable enough for what I wanted to use it for. It's sitting in a bin in my office likely going off to a yard sale for charity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp 01/01/2017and it was working fine until a week ago (March 2019). Our daughter liked it a lot. But a week ago the touch button stopped responding to the touch. I contacted customer service and they were so kind and send me a new replacement lamp! Thanks! Excellent customer service and a good product
customer_reviews.author: INLev

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I just love this lamp! The clip is seriously strong, the light fantastic. The fact that you can adjust the brightness, that you can bend the arm, that you can clip it (strongly, reliably!) to a variety of objects makes this so very, very useful. I use it over my laptop/writing desk, but also at times bring it into bed with me, clamping it onto the wall behind me. Absolutely fantastic product, and more so for the very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: lilcreative

customer_reviews.title: This is the best clip light ever for a short while
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for charting on a night shift home case. It portable and makes charting easier.I love the touch dimmer on off setting and the clip.l ]also like that it can stand alone without clipping it.it is a great value for the price.upate 3/4/18 lamp no longer working
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: What I love about the lamp
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the lamp: It has a big clamp that works to anchor the light to the top of my work cubicle. The neck is flexible so you can angle the light where needed. Light levels are adjustable and the power button is unique--it doesn't press in but instead responds to a very light tap from your finger. What keeps it from being five stars is the short cord. But it's an excellent deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Borinquena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my son's bottom bunk so we can read at night. adjustable light, easy on and off, love this.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I clip this lamp on the side of my desk. I like that it’s adjustable and has three different light settings. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: This is a good lamp, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lamp, reasonably priced. I should have ordered a taller one for my initial purpose in ordering it, but I put it to use in another setting. So far it dims and brightens well and illuminates a fair area. I would prefer a more flexible gooseneck. The packaging was good, and shipment was prompt. I have recommended it to a client who noticed it in my office and wanted to know where to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Knight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp for puzzle table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who enjoys solving puzzles but needed some additional light. He's very impressed with the clip on and touch features. It's very easy to move around his puzzle table and to choose the brightness he needs at various times. He says this is the best gift ever, and now he doesn't have to take my reading lamp away from me. This little lamp has made us both very happy. I highly recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Gal

customer_reviews.title: Not metal
customer_reviews.text: Quality feels very cheap. The Amazon description says in three different places that the material is metal, which is the main reason I bought this one over the other similar models. It's not metal anywhere, its all plastic. The clamp won't work if the table is very thick (1.25" is about the max) and the lamp HAS to be clamped to something, it won't stand up on its own. Its also not as bright as I was hoping it would be. It may be usable for some applications, but it wasn't for mine and I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Great reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: A really large clip, but the lamp works well and stays in place. I do a lot of reading and this lamp is perfect for the background light I need. It also works great as a night light so I leave it on when I turn off the overhead and don't stumble through the dark. The clip stays clipped and the neck also remains as you set it. I don't know how long it lasts -- we'll see (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Young

customer_reviews.title: Steady, cool and bright!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the lamp on my baby grand piano for a month or so now, and love it! It holds firmly to the music stand without shifting, the flexible arm stays in exactly the position that I want, and the lamp casts a steady, clean white light on the music pages. The 3-position dimmer allows me to control the light to augment the ambient light in the room comfortably. The LED emits no perceptible heat, so the keyboard area underneath it remains far more comfortable than with the old incandescent lamps I've used before. I'm completely delighted with with this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee

customer_reviews.title: a GREAT lamp!!!  for YOU, too!
customer_reviews.text: Lamp arrived in PERFECT condition. i'm sorry for the review where the client received a dirty cord with suspicious plug, but mine is in GREAT shape!! clipped it on, plugged it in, and GO!! it's even better -- it has THREE levels of brightness and is controlled by a mere touch. it's PERFECT for over the bed, where i read. i STRONGLY recommend it. i hope the other client got his issues resolved. this really is a TERRIFIC purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MUAATHA B AMATUL-HAQQ

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on my stand for cross-stitching. Wish I had bought this years ago. And with LED technology, not heat!
customer_reviews.author: Sandrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for beds for reading
customer_reviews.text: My girls 6yrs and 10yrs have these on their bed for night time reading. These are bright and seem great quality. The clip is strong and the neck is adjustable. 3 light settings that can be changed with a finger touch at base. Now my son wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different versions of these lamps from this company. I love them both. I saw a couple complaints in other reviews with minor quirks. However, that is true for anything that is mass produced. If you light flickers, simply ask for a replacement. The three brightness levels are very convenient. The light can be bright, but it is still softened so that it doesn't hurt your eyes. I will likely get more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Goodstone79

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a light in a dark room, here it is. You can put it as near or far as you need for so many uses. Great for reading, stitching, or any kind of close up work. I recommend this light and am happy to have finally found it here.
customer_reviews.author: Nitamcb

customer_reviews.title: Really love it!
customer_reviews.text: Clips well, love the range of rotation for directing the light, and love the three levels of light. Dim is nice and gives different amour of light depending on direction you aim it and where it hits in your room ceiling, wall, shelf. I have it clipped to a shelf above my bed. Really happy with purchase! Am buying one for my daughter to clip to her desk hutch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this lamp. Plugged it in and tried to turn on, but lamp doesn't work. I used the cord it came with and made sure it had power, but lamp is a dud. UPDATE: great customer service. Great response after they found out the first one I got was broken. The second one I got works great. Very happy with how it was treated and how quick they were to replace the non-working one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp...will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. I clipped it on my paper holder and it hasn't budged. Was just what I needed for my work space. It changes easily from one brightness setting to another. Will buy again. NOTE:. If you are looking for a stand alone lamp...this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old son study/computer table. The light has 3 dimmer choices. The brightness does not hurt the eyes and it very bright. One of my best purchases from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: TessMK

customer_reviews.title: nice clean design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two lamps for my bed and breakfast guests. The lamps seem well-made, nice clean design, easy to use, and easy to clamp to the headboard. I like the one-touch button on the base; no fumbling for a cord switch. I hope they last for a long time. Update: One of the lamps started to flicker after only 4 months of light use in my summer-only B&B. The bulbs are said to last 20 years, but not this one. I am disappointed that this one did not last, but am ordering a replacement in hopes it was just a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Another great thing about this lamp is it has three different ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp to help with lighting on the bottom bunk of a bunk bed. This clips on to the side rails perfectly. Also, there is an option to hang from a nail or screw. This is located on the underside of the clamp. Another great thing about this lamp is it has three different settings for the light: High, medium, and low light.
customer_reviews.author: M. Symchych

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night time feedings!
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp was the perfect solution to nighttime feedings. We attached it to the side of our co sleeper and it allows us to get some light when we need to change and feed our baby without using cell phones or flashlights, which is cumbersome. The touch part is amazing , and it clips on strongly. I'm sure we will find another good use for it after baby doesn't need it anymore as well.
customer_reviews.author: ChicoTwinMommy

product_meta.title: KEDSUM 7W Dimmable LED Clip on Lamp, Flexible Gooseneck Clip on Reading Light with 3-Level Dimmer, Touch-Sensitive Control Panel, Clamp Lamp for Desk
feature_bullets: FLEXIBLE GOOSENECK :360° metal house,half of the neck is solid but the top half is flexible ,minimalistic design with adjustable gooseneck to optimize your lighting source.
3-LEVEL BRIGHTNESS :3-level brightness,touch-Sensitive Control Panel,meet your needs in different light environments.
LED LIGHTING SOURCE :Reflective LED lighting source provides Natural, non-flickering light for stress-free productivity and enjoyment.

MULTI-USE CLIP- Adjustable clip up to 2.5 inch ,Great for Music Stands, Pianos, Bedside, Reading, Work Tables, Mixing Tables, Computer Desks, Craft Tables and Much More.Extra Strong Clip Grips Almost Anything or Use it Free Standing.

EYE PROTECTION: Eye-caring reading light made of high quality 24 LED chips & soft and non-flickering 5000k warm white light offer non-ghosting and non-flickering light, the book light won't make eyes fatigued even staying in the light for a long time. It is a great gift for kids & bookworms.

specifications.Special Features: 3-LEVEL brightness, One-touch control, Use in clip-on or freestanding mode, Flexible gooseneck, Surface LED lighting source
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,160 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
